00048       class CurrentState :public EUROPA::Entity {
00049       public:
00050        using EUROPA::LabelStr; // Needed in order to use DECLARE_ENTITY_TYPE
00051        DECLARE_ENTITY_TYPE(CurrentState);
00052 
00053        typedef EUROPA::Id<CurrentState> id_type;
00054 
00055        ~CurrentState();
00056        
00057        id_type const &getId() const {
00058          return m_id;
00059        }
00060 
00061        EUROPA::TimelineId const timeline() const;
00062        EUROPA::eint       now() const;
00063        bool               known() const;
00064        bool               committed() const;
00065 
00066        EUROPA::TokenId    current() const;
00067        
00068        LabelStr const &default_predicate() const;
00069        std::set<LabelStr> const &predicates() const;
00070 
00071        void extend_current()
00072        void commit();
00073 
00074       private:
00075        CurrentState(Assembly &assembly, EUROPA::TimelineId const &timeline, 
00076                    StateListener *listener);
00077        
00078        EUROPA::TimelineId   m_timeline;
00079        EUROPA::TokenId      m_lastObs;
00080        EUROPA::ConstraintId m_cstr;
00081        id_type m_id;
00082 
00083        Assembly      &m_assembly;
00084        StateListener *m_listener;
00085

00087       }; // TREX::europa::details::CurrentState
